title: Serena in Italian means "calm" but my attitude is to be strong like a storm.
description:
Iâ€™m a Italian graphic and motion designer specialized in identity, direction and animation.\
I graduated to Accademia delle Arti e Nuove Tecnologie with Art Direction degree in 2013.

intro.title: My work is my passion.
intro.description: Create beautiful content for my clients is my priority and your happiness is more important than mine.

content:
My role involves understanding the new client requests, suggesting improvements to the design and building it to ensure it provides the best possible customer experience and fits the criteria required.\
I have had to be highly organised in order to meet tight deadlines both at work and study. I have a serious passion for design and I always try to improve and perfect my craft, I'm perfectionist.

metadata.title: Something about Serena Paratore
metadata.description: Serena Paratore is a graphic and motion designer, based in Rome. I graduated to Accademia delle Arti e Nuove Tecnologie with Art Direction degree in 2013.
